title: HTML What is a Web API

content.heading: Web API Overview
paragraphs: A Web API (Application Programming Interface) simplifies complex functions and extends browser capabilities.

content.heading: What is a Web API?
paragraphs: APIs provide functions to access application or system features. Web APIs are designed for web applications.

content.heading: HTML5 APIs
paragraphs: - Drag and Drop: Enable drag-and-drop features
- Web Workers: Run scripts in the background
Always check browser support and implement robust error handling.
